Description.Details: Intended for reconnaissance 'Mechs or vehicles, the C3 Command Unit, also known as C3 Master Computer, is the central hub of a C3 Network and allows linked units to share radar and targeting data on the lance or company levels. By sharing targeting data lance mates gain an increase to the distance a weapon is considered in optimal range.

Description.Name: C3 NETWORK RANGE BUFF
Description.Details: Friendly units within a C3 Network gain [AMT] increase in optimal weapon range.
